item.title: The Poppy War
item.description: War doesn’t determine who’s right. War determines who remains. That… is quite a book. Plotwise, for the first third or so, it’s a very solid ‘poor girl works very hard and gets into a prestigious (military) school’. Once there, she’s outcast and has to fight (literally) for her place. On top of that, she bumps into the mysterious ‘Lore’ master who everyone thinks is nuts–but just might know a bit about the magic no one believes in any more.
